messages.title: Pat's NHS Survey
messages.content: Having collected 6000 signatures for an A&E at John Coupland Hospital because another there were more issues that you wanted us to get funded a survey to see what concerns to fight for an improved service. 'I prefer to ask people what they want rather than telling them' said Pat

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Collected signatures for A&E at John Coupland Hospital, concerns revealed through NHS survey to fight for improved services.
Fairer taxes that put money back in your pocket.
Safe after school care for every child and abolish university tuition fees.
Create jobs by making Britain greener, invest in public transport, renewable energy and energy efficient homes.
A fair deal from the politicians: make politicians accountable and give the right to sack corrupt MPs.

issues.education: Safe after school care for every child and abolish university tuition fees.
issues.environment: Create jobs by making Britain greener
issues.governance: Make politicians accountable and give the right to sack corrupt MPs.
issues.health: Support for A&E at John Coupland Hospital; improve NHS services.

housing.content: Axe the Council Tax and replace it with a fairer local income tax â€“ Council Tax bears no relation to people's ability to pay and penalises pensioners and people on low incomes, who pay a higher proportion of their income in tax than the very rich. We will scrap the Council Tax and replace it with local Income Tax, which is fairer and affordable.

politicalExperience.achievements: Advocated for standard in Parliament; helped get a new Police Community Support Officer in position; worked for the community he represents on the County Council; involved in securing a new secondary school.

images.caption: Pat O'Connor with constituents and supporting a new school
Pat O'Connor surveying for NHS improvements

leaflet.additionalNotes: Local campaigning focuses on NHS services, education, and fairer taxes. Highlights past political experience and successful initiatives.
